TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit TimeSpanValidator extends System.Configuration.ConfigurationValidatorBase

span.span: Provides validation of a object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类用于确保对象符合特定条件。The class is used to ensure that a object meets specific criteria. 包含两个参数的构造函数，可确保最小值和最多值遵守。The constructor with two parameters ensures that both a minimum and a maximum value are adhered to. 带有三个参数的构造函数检查最小值和最大值，以及验证范围是否唯一。The constructor with three parameters checks both the minimum and maximum values, as well as whether the validation range is exclusive. 具有四个参数构造函数可以检查前面三个参数外，还检查是否值是否等于特定的秒数。The constructor with four parameters checks the previous three parameters and also checks whether the value is equal to a specific number of seconds. 方法确定正在验证的对象类型是否与预期的类型匹配。The method determines whether the object type being validated matches the expected type. 正在验证该对象被传递的参数方法。The object being validated is passed as a parameter of the method. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用类型。The following code example demonstrates how to use the type. remarks.format: ## Remarks 当使用含有两个参数的构造函数，对象验证值是否满足为特定范围。When the constructor with two parameters is used, the object validates that a value adheres to a specific range.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 构造函数检查最小值和最大值，以及验证范围是否唯一。The constructor checks both the minimum and maximum values, as well as whether the validation range is exclusive. 当`rangeIsExclusive`参数设置为`true`、值不能在之间`minValue`和`maxValue`值。When the `rangeIsExclusive` parameter is set to `true`, the value must not be between the `minValue` and `maxValue` values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当`resolutionInSeconds`指定参数，对象正被验证必须等于此值才能通过验证。When the `resolutionInSeconds` parameter is specified, the object being validated must be equal to this value in order to pass validation. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用构造函数。The following code example demonstrates how to use the constructor. 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. remarks.format: ## Remarks 对象包含验证所需的规则对象。The object contains the rules necessary to validate a object. 实例时，规则建立创建类。The rules are established when an instance of the class is created. 要验证的对象作为参数传递方法。The object to validate is passed as a parameter of the method. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 方法。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method. 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class.
